segments.text: I feel so sad looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her work that she doesn’t notice anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks like it’s going to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not realizing how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how alone she seems, even though she’s surrounded by chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even look.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the peaceful garden and the chaos inside is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and help her before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so melancholic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this anymore; it’s making me too sad.
segments.speaker: PAR
